name: CMBlockBuffer.Error
desc: A structure that defines block buffer errors.

items.name: static let badCustomBlockSource: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates an attempt to create a block buffer without a valid source.

items.name: static let badLengthParameter: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates you called a function with an invalid length parameter.

items.name: static let badOffsetParameter: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates you called a function with offset value is out of range.

items.name: static let badPointerParameter: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates a parameter is invalid.

items.name: static let blockAllocationFailed: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates you specified an invalid allocation block.

items.name: static let emptyBlockBuffer: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates you passed an empty block buffer to a function.

items.name: static let insufficientSpace: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates thereâ€™s insufficient space to perform the operation.

items.name: static let structureAllocationFailed: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates the allocation of a structure failed.

items.name: static let unallocatedBlock: NSError
items.desc: An error that indicates a function encountered an unallocated block of memory.
